instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B, GPU Replaced but red screen in the backgroud
threads.message:
I replaced <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>'s GPU, it was 005, I installed a chipset produced in 2019 reballed.
but after 3 months there is a problem of a red screen in the background but it boot and you could switch between the integrated and the AMD Gpu with no problems    [ATTACH alt="81267890_1075806299432535_6934175457591951360_n.jpg" type="full"]55577._xfImport[/ATTACH]
